projects.name: Narative Media
projects.description: This website is the face of a startup agency Narrative Media which helps content creator to grow their social media. Through the website user can contact the team of Narrative Media and can book a meeting.

projects.name: GetSet
projects.description: The design contains admin panel in which admin can have access to the information about orders, queries, delivery person and many more with the help of figma.

projects.name: Boxie Jumps
projects.description: Boxie Jump is a basic jumping game in which we can collect points by collecting coins and by killing enemies.

projects.name: Supervision Model For Cookie Industry
projects.description: Supervision in the cookie industry uses image recognition methods and Python programming to reduces the cost required for production of the cookie and also helps in quality assurance.

projects.name: HYBRID CAFE Website
projects.description: It is a e-commerce website for ordering food creacted using HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP and MySql which also contains admin panel in which there is an analysis section for analysing the growth of the cafe which is creacted using Chart.js.

projects.name: Design For Narative Media
projects.description: The design contains Home, About us, Services, Contact us panel in a single page in figma.

projects.name: Weather Website
projects.description: This website allows users to check the current weather and forecast for various locations. With a clean and intuitive interface, users can easily search for a specific location and obtain detailed weather information.

projects.name: Red Magic FC
projects.description: This design contains Home, Countact us, About Us, News page for the football club.
